ComicInfo.Summary: Geek-Girl is set to front a new Super-Team, backed by (morally dubious) entrepreneur Johnny Carlyle - but as the team are coming together, things take an unexpected turn... So Ruby Kaye (a.k.a Geek-Girl), BFF Summer and new team-mate The Minger - now getting a night off - meet Ruby and Summer's (mean) girl friends at an outlandish, fancy-dress club nite. Ruby wants to go incognito, and Summer gets to go in the Geek-Girl costume and glasses - with powers! But meanwhile, Johnny Carlyle's right-hand man Digger Mensch is having conflict with his super-villain pals 'cos of being involved with the super-team, and someone's contacting the dead!
